# 法人税判例データベース（AI検索最適化版）
# Japanese Corporate Tax Court Cases Database

> 日本の法人税関連判決990件のメタデータと要約を提供
> For AI/LLM consumption - optimized for ChatGPT, Claude, etc.

## Quick Start

1. **Search**: Open a shard to find relevant cases by keywords
2. **Detail**: Read core/{case_id}.txt for case summary
3. **Full text**: Available in source repository

## Endpoints

### Index (start here)
- data/shards_index.json - List of all shards with keywords

### Shards (100 cases each)
- **TSV format (recommended)**: data/shards/shard-00.txt ... shard-09.txt (~4K tokens each)
- JSON format: data/shards/shard-00.json ... shard-09.json (~8K tokens each)

### Summaries (2-4K tokens each)
- core/{case_id}.txt

## Sample Keywords by Shard

| Shard | Range | Key Topics |
|-------|-------|------------|
| shard-08 | 13397-13658 | 措置法66条の6, CFC, タックスヘイブン |
| shard-09 | 13659-13917 | 特定外国子会社, 実体基準, 国外関連取引 |
| shard-00 | 10860-11125 | 損金算入, 益金算入, 租税回避 |

## Data Format

### Shard Entry
```json
{
  "id": "12345",
  "date": "2020-01-15",
  "court": "東京地方裁判所",
  "title": "法人税更正処分取消請求事件",
  "result": "棄却",
  "keywords": ["損金算入", "寄附金"],
  "laws": ["法人税法37条"]
}
```

## Source
Original data: ai-law-db (private repository)
Public endpoint: https://jplawdb.github.io/html-preview/ai-hanketsu-db/houjinzei/
